content: Will the tutorial lectures be streamed on Zoom? Online participants could benefit from attending the lecture and having access to the exercises, even if online interaction during the exercise sessions turns out to be difficult or impossible.
Yes, the tutorials will be streamed on Zoom just like the talks.
And they'll all be stored on YouTube I hope?
Yes, we're recording everything on Zoom, and then we'll edit and upload them later.
Hello, where can I find the Zoom links for the talks and tutorials, and when will these be available?
